item.title: Road makings missing, 7th November
item.description:
Recently the council renewed the white lines at all road entrances between the side road and Chislehurst Road. Unfortunately, they forgot to do this at the entrance of Hill Brow and Chislehurst Road. As such, traffic often cuts across the road when turning into Hill Brow. There are a lot of children from the two local schools that cross this road entrance and also many cars entering and leaving the road making it dangerous for everyone. Please remark the road entrance as it previously and always has been marked.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Hill Brow, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road subsiding and falling away around drain., 7th November
item.description:
The road around the drain is falling away and subsiding. Vehicles are driving over the drain constantly as itâ€™s a busy road. The drain is making a loud banging sound and the road is getting more damaged with each car passing over it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upton Road, Blendon, London

item.title: Road breaking away and exposing underneath of man hole, 7th November
item.description:
This keep getting larger and due tot he heavy rainfall recently, it leads the area surrounding prone to flooding. This is very noticeable when driving, especially as it is now increasing in size rapidly, it is becoming a major safety concern for a busy road both cars and pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Old Maidstone Road, London
